title: GSEP L3 Traceability and Simulation Data Schema
description: Defines the mandatory structure and fields for simulation outputs (generated by PSR) required to calculate the S-01 Efficacy Projection and S-02 Risk Synthesis.

artifact_id.description: Cryptographically unique hash linking back to the L2 Payload.

simulation_runtime.description: Duration of L3 execution in milliseconds.

empirical_trust_score_projection.description: Raw data feeding into ATM for S-01 calculation.

critical_failure_vector.description: List of critical failure events detected during simulation, feeding into MCRA for S-02.
